description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React, ReactDOM, stylesheet, and the main App component. It initializes the React app by mounting the App component to the DOM element with id 'root' using React 18's createRoot API.

methods.name: createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root to manage rendering within a DOM element

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders a React element into the root container
